author: eviste
title: A great addition to your freight train
review: This shell tanker wagon is a great addition to any 12v layout. It looks particularly good with the 7823: Container Crane Depot and 7839: Car Transport Depot wagons. It's really solid when constructed and although there are no particularly special parts it really does complete your set up well.

author: Crazy_Chris
title: Much better than 7816
review:
Overview
Year of release: 1986
Last year in catalog: 1990
Set type: single wagon (compact size)
Generation (within grey era): 3.5
Predecessor (within grey era): 7816
Successor (within grey era): none

Description
After a gap of three years, a new shell tanker van was released in 1986. Compared to 7816, it looks very much modernized. There are interesting details, and there is a kind of petrol winch which increases playability.

Variants and alternate parts
No variants are known for this set.

Personal opinion
This one is way better than 7816. And, it is the perfect add-on for 7722 and 7735.
